name: FNF - The Date Full Week
description:
The canceled WhitMORE update now as a standalone mod.
Play as Whitty as you hang with Carol on 3 dates!

This project was in development (on and off) since the day Whitty came out, funny enough. and now it has finished at the day Whitty goes away! This mod is a celebration and a love letter to the Friday Night Funkin Modding community, as they have the most wonderful individuals you could ever meet! (and the worst but that's another convo)
